sitedata.metadesc: Trusted By Fine Real Estate Professionals

about.abouttext2: The Broadmoor is a 5 star world-renowned luxury hotel and resort built in 1918 in the Old Broadmoor neighborhood of Colorado Springs. Situated at the base of Cheyenne Mtn with spectacular views, the resort has hotel, conference, sports, and spa buildings that radiate out from Cheyenne Lake. It also offers 3 championship designed golf courses to choose from. The Broadmoor Hotel visitors have included heads of state, celebrities, and professional sports stars.
